thread.title: Judge Orders Documents Released About Trump’s EPA Nominee
thread.title_full: Judge Orders Documents Released About Trump’s EPA Nominee

author: Jack Davis
title: Judge Orders Documents Released About Trump’s EPA Nominee

organizations.name: senate environment and public works committee

text:
As of Thursday night, Sen. Susan Collins , R-Maine, is the lone Republican in the Senate to say she will oppose Pruitt. Two Democrats, Sens. Joe Manchin, D-W.Va., and Heidi Heitkamp, D-N.D., have said they will support the nominee. After careful consideration, I have decided to oppose the confirmation of Scott Pruitt for EPA Administrator https://t.co/QRuRtVua1X 
— Sen. Susan Collins (@SenatorCollins) February 15, 2017 
“Clearly, this is an epic ram-job,” said Sen. Sheldon Whitehouse, D-R.I. Advertisement - story continues below 
“The public has a right to know what is in all of those emails,” said Sen. Ed Markey, D-Mass. “They have a right to know what the record is of the chief protector of the environment in the United States.” 
Democrats wanted the documents, but Pruitt declined to provide them, saying senators needed to go through the state’s process for requesting public records. 
Senate Environment and Public Works Committee Chairman John Barrasso, R-Wyo., said Democrats have been given enough information about Pruitt. 
“Democrats have even complained that he has not been vetted thoroughly enough,” he said. “That’s ridiculous. Scott Pruitt is the most thoroughly vetted nominee we’ve ever had to lead this agency.” Advertisement - story continues below
